items.summary:
Ensure the deployed frontend serves a `/.well-known/ic-domains` text file that contains exactly two lines (one domain per line) with no extra spaces, quotes, or trailing blank lines:
1) `dirtydaves.co.uk`
2) `www.dirtydaves.co.uk`
The file must be located at `frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains` so it is included in the static asset deployment.

Update the production smoke test documentation to reflect the new expected `/.well-known/ic-domains` content (two lines including `www`) and add a verification check for `/.well-known/ii-alternative-origins` returning the exact JSON payload.

Add a short post-deploy checklist note (in an existing deployment/production doc) listing the remaining manual steps outside Caffeine for domain setup for canister `fd6rd-maaaa-aaaah-atocq-cai`, including the exact DNS records and the optional boundary-node registration/status URLs the user provided.
